#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

main()
{
 
    int t, value[500], weight[500], min_value[10000];
    cin >> t;
    while( t-- )
    {
        int e, f, n;
        cin >> e >> f;
        cin >> n;
        for( int i=0; i<n; i++)
            cin >> value[i] >> weight[i];
 
        min_value[0] = 0;
        f -=e;
        for( int wei=1; wei<=f; wei++)
        {
            int min = 500000000;
            for( int item = 0; item <n; item++ )
            {
                int t = wei - weight[item];
                if( t >= 0 )
                    min = min < value[item] + min_value[t] ? min : value[item] + min_value[t] ;
            }
            min_value[wei] = min;
        }
        if( min_value[f] < 500000000)
            cout << "The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is " << min_value[f] << "." << endl;
        else cout << "This is impossible" << endl;
    }
}
